com.crudzilla.ant.launch

Class CrudzillaLogListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crudzilla.ant.launch.CrudzillaLogListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.apache.tools.ant.BuildListener

    public class CrudzillaLogListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.tools.ant.BuildListener
    Listener which sends events to Log4j logging system
